<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Choose an insertion point for our new instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IP = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af2a9add76255a5e6dc09b1a5f9505f21">uniform&lt;size&#95;t&gt;</a>(IB.Rand, 0, Insts.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>() - 1);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Choose a source, which will be used to constrain the operation selection.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Value &#42;, 2&gt;</a> Srcs;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Choose an operation that&#39;s constrained to be valid for the type of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// source, collect any other sources it needs, and then build it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OpDesc = chooseOperation(Srcs&#91;0&#93;, IB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Bail if no operation was found</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!OpDesc)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Pred : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab9c6b351507d3c0730f4290919d43a12">ArrayRef</a>(OpDesc-&gt;SourcePreds).slice(1))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Srcs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(IB.findOrCreateSource(BB, InstsBefore, Srcs, Pred));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> = OpDesc-&gt;BuilderFunc(Srcs, Insts&#91;IP&#93;-&gt;getIterator())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find a sink and wire up the results of the operation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">    IB.connectToSink(BB, InstsAfter, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instdeleterirstrategy/#a7af0e4ae5d5b18203ace012d7aa077b6"><span class="doxyHighlight">uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instdeleterirstrategy/#a7af0e4ae5d5b18203ace012d7aa077b6">InstDeleterIRStrategy::getWeight</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CurrentSize, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxSize,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                          uint64&#95;t CurrentWeight) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we have less than 200 bytes, panic and try to always delete.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CurrentSize &gt; MaxSize - 200)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CurrentWeight ? CurrentWeight &#42; 100 : 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Draw a line starting from when we only have 1k left and increasing linearly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to double the current weight.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  int64&#95;t Line = (-2 &#42; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">int64&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(CurrentWeight)) &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">int64&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(MaxSize) -</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">int64&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(CurrentSize) - 1000) /</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 1000;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Clamp negative weights to zero.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Line &lt; 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Line;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350" lineLink="#ad84119ef27970279d969c50b73d8d62b"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="#ad84119ef27970279d969c50b73d8d62b">getUniqueCaseValue</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallset">SmallSet&lt;uint64&#95;t, 4&gt;</a> &amp;CasesTaken,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> tmp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Determine Integer type, it IS possible we use a boolean to switch.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Choose an Instruction to mutate.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t Idx = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af2a9add76255a5e6dc09b1a5f9505f21">uniform&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a>(IB.Rand, 0, Insts.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>() - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;Inst = Insts&#91;Idx&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#96;Idx + 1&#96; so we don&#39;t sink to ourselves.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InstsAfter = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab9c6b351507d3c0730f4290919d43a12">ArrayRef</a>(Insts).slice(Idx + 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;Ty = Inst-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t sink terminators, void function calls, token, etc.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Ty-&gt;isVoidTy() &amp;&amp; !Ty-&gt;isTokenTy())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find a new sink and wire up the results of the operation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><span class="doxyHighlight">    IB.connectToSink(BB, InstsAfter, Inst);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/shuffleblockstrategy/#a3bad39b7c7fd81aa15068f082eb6f0a6"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/shuffleblockstrategy/#a3bad39b7c7fd81aa15068f082eb6f0a6">ShuffleBlockStrategy::mutate</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &amp;BB, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/randomirbuilder">RandomIRBuilder</a> &amp;IB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A deterministic alternative to SmallPtrSet with the same lookup</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// performance.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::map&lt;size&#95;t, Instruction &#42;&gt; AliveInsts;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::map&lt;Instruction &#42;, size&#95;t&gt; AliveInstsLookup;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InsertIdx = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3d2cdc4a0db233678e7141c9d6ea3419">make&#95;early&#95;inc&#95;range</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a341215803e83773a3e97860dc291f121">make&#95;range</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><span class="doxyHighlight">           BB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a161fd4e9fa5367f64c2a4c9e921c3ad3">getFirstInsertionPt</a>(), BB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#aef9e9fcf4c5dfce90276ca16d91b8e46">getTerminator</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-node-impl/#af719fc783be6589465137d997701a432">getIterator</a>()))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First gather all instructions that can be shuffled. Don&#39;t take</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// terminator.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><span class="doxyHighlight">    AliveInsts.insert(&#123;InsertIdx, &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><span class="doxyHighlight">    AliveInstsLookup.insert(&#123;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, InsertIdx++&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Then remove these instructions from the block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.removeFromParent();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Shuffle these instructions using topological sort.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="610"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Returns false if all current instruction&#39;s dependencies in this block have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="611"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// been shuffled. If so, this instruction can be shuffled too.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="612"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> hasAliveParent = &#91;&amp;AliveInsts, &amp;AliveInstsLookup&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Index) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="613"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;O : AliveInsts&#91;Index&#93;-&gt;operands()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="614"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(O);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="615"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a> &amp;&amp; AliveInstsLookup.count(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="616"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="617"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="619"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="620"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get all alive instructions that depend on the current instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="621"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Takes Instruction&#42; instead of index because the instruction is already</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="622"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// shuffled.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="623"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> getAliveChildren = &#91;&amp;AliveInstsLookup&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="624"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallsetvector">SmallSetVector&lt;size&#95;t, 8&gt;</a> Children;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="625"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;U : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;users()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="626"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(U)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="627"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> It = AliveInstsLookup.find(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="628"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (It != AliveInstsLookup.end())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="629"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Children.insert(It-&gt;second);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="630"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="631"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="632"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Children;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="633"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="634"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallset">SmallSet&lt;size&#95;t, 8&gt;</a> RootIndices;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="635"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Instruction &#42;, 8&gt;</a> Insts;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;&#91;Index, Inst&#93; : AliveInsts) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!hasAliveParent(Index))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="638"><span class="doxyHighlight">      RootIndices.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallset/#afcadfef2cf37c3e6dbdbc9cd7bea50a0">insert</a>(Index);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="639"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="640"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Topological sort by randomly selecting a node without a parent, or root.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="641"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!RootIndices.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallset/#a34384400167eb6ebf71fa89d98ba03bc">empty</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="642"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RS = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6695fbc0cb8edb5aede4af74f2ef95d0">makeSampler&lt;size&#95;t&gt;</a>(IB.Rand);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RootIdx : RootIndices)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644"><span class="doxyHighlight">      RS.sample(RootIdx, 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RootIdx = RS.getSelection();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647"><span class="doxyHighlight">    RootIndices.erase(RootIdx);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="648"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;Root = AliveInsts&#91;RootIdx&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"><span class="doxyHighlight">    AliveInsts.erase(RootIdx);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"><span class="doxyHighlight">    AliveInstsLookup.erase(Root);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Insts.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(Root);</span></CodeLine>
